full_summary:
================================================================================================(corsain utiliziacy)<-----

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Tender Information**

* **Title**: Aluminum Shallow Water
* **Reference Number**: PW__MC-009-29066
* **Solicitation Number**: M4500-233974/B
* **Publication Date**: May 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (EDT)
* **Tender Status**: Expired

**Procurement Details**

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Competition Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: New Brunswick
* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information**: Brianne Gagnon, [briann.gagnon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:briann.gagnon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca), (873) 355-4939

**Notice of Procurement**

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proposals for the construction of one (1) 5.5-6.58 Aluminum Shallow Water Boat, including trailer and engine. The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Interested suppliers must meet all the Mandatory Requirements specified in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

The primary role of the boat is for emergency responses. All deliverables for the vessel must be delivered to the RCMP "J" Division Border Integrity on or before March 31st, 2024. This requirement is not subject to security vetting. 

The lowest-priced compliant proposal will be recommended for award. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. 

**Important Dates**

* **Publication Date**: May 10, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None (see tender documents for details)
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None (see tender documents for details)
